message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase my product for $1600000.  This is a fantastic deal, as you know the product is worth at least $1500000 to you.  I believe this price reflects its value and provides you with a good return on your investment.  Let me know if you're interested, and we can discuss the details further.  If you decline, I have another interested buyer willing to pay the full $1500000.
